page.title: 13Nurseries-Swanley area
page.content: We did a survey of 5 nurseries.They all grew a variety of flowers and vegetables.All had greenhouses;one had 14,one had 2 and one had 4.The other 2 nurseries had 1/2 acre of glass and 6 acres of glass. They did not sell other things except 1 who also sold seeds,and another selling straw and hay. 3 nurseries sold there products on the site,2 sold them to shops and markets and the others sold them to a flower wholesaler,garden centres and the new Covent Garden market. The nurseries also employed different numbers of workers.1 was just a family concern,the others employed 1, 2,4 and 40 workers,with some casual and part time workers as well.
